record.field: [1601-C (Compensation)] 2025-12

BIR FORM: 1601-C (Compensation) PERIOD COVERED: 2025-12 BIR DEADLINE: 2025-01-15
WORKFLOW: Step 1: Preparation (2025-01-09) - Responsible: Finance Supervisor (BOM) - Action: Gather data, prepare BIR Form, draft payment request - Target: BIR Deadline - 4 Business Days
Step 2: Report Approval (2025-01-13) - Responsible: Senior Finance Manager (RIM) - Action: Review and approve report data - Target: BIR Deadline - 2 Business Days
Step 3: Payment Approval (2025-01-14) - Responsible: Finance Director (CKVC) - Action: Approve payment release - Target: BIR Deadline - 1 Business Day
Step 4: Filing & Payment (2025-01-15) - Responsible: Finance Supervisor (BOM) - Action: File form and remit payment
